item.description: Comet and Holly wanted to see their friends again and share their park by the river with everyone. We can take a hike around the park area and also let the dogs play in the fenced in yard. This would be perfect for those dogs who like to be in an enclosed area off leash! So meet us there and we can have some fun playing by the river! We are making it a bit early since we are working that day!
item.how_to_find_us: In the parking lot with Comet and Holly!

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Riverside Park!!!
